title: Organic Farming
description: Sustainable farming method using natural fertilizers and crop rotation.

title: Precision Agriculture
description: Modern farming technique using GPS and sensors for better crop yield.

title: Hydroponics
description: Soil-less farming where plants grow in nutrient-rich water.

title: Agroforestry
description: Combining agriculture and forestry to create more productive land.

title: Drip Irrigation
description: Efficient water management system that minimizes water waste.

title: Vertical Farming
description: Growing crops in stacked layers to save space and resources.
